title: GreyEnergy
extract: GreyEnergy is an Advanced Persistent Threat (APT) which has been targeting industrial networks in Ukraine and other Eastern European countries for the past several years. ... Phishing emails with infected documents are a primary way the GreyEnergy ICS malware starts its attacks on industrial networks.Nov 20, 2018
